text:
Critics argue that the Bilderberg Group represents an undemocratic and elitist

approach to governance, where a small group of powerful individuals make

decisions on behalf of the people (url website). This perception is fueled by the

fact that the group's membership includes many high-ranking politicians,

business leaders, and intellectuals who are not directly accountable to the

public.
